sentences: The Secretariat and LDC Expert Group (LEG) Chair Bubu Pateh Jallow reported on LDC issues and progress on NAPAs ( FCCC/SBI/2006/23 ).
The EU stressed the LEG role in NAPA preparation, monitoring NAPA implementation, and developing best practice standards for adaptation measures.
SIERRA LEONE, TANZANIA and MOZAMBIQUE stressed the importance of NAPA preparation and implementation.
Chair Becker will prepare draft conclusions.
